title: my computer screen has been mest up lately and i dont know what the problem is
body: it has a white line at the top and my screen is not full when im playing a game

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be playing in windowed mode. Try checking to see if this is the case by hopping into a custom match and looking at your *'windowed mode'* settings under the **VIDEO** section. I recommend switching to full screen or borderless. 

Here's a screenshot to show what these settings look like. Simply click the image to enlarge it.

https://imgur.com/PfYU5EP

Let me know if this helped.
